thread.title: Best Value in New York City
thread.title_full: Best Value in New York City - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mattcU6226WV
title: Best Value in New York City
text: Great Location , Great Staff & Very Clean and Comfortable Rooms . Located on 24th Street between 6th & 7th this is a great location for business or Families on Holidays . I found the staff very helpful and the Rooms Modern and Clean . The Beds are also very comfortable which a huge must for me travelling over 24 hours from Australia to reach New York for Business .
